alert.note: Alert for Concho; Kimble; McCulloch; Menard; Schleicher; Sutton; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 11:07PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Schleicher, northwestern Kimble, southeastern Tom Green, southwestern McCulloch, Menard, Concho and Sutton Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1106 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles east of Eola to near Adams to 15 miles east of Ozona. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brady, Sonora, Eldorado, Menard, Paint Rock, Eden, Melvin, Brady Lake, Calf Creek, Roosevelt, Salt Gap, Hext, Millersview, Fort Mckavett, Live Oak, Camp Sol Mayer, Vick, Cleo, Adams and The Intersection Of Us-190 And Ranch Road 1311. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 384 and 430. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Concho; Kimble; McCulloch; Menard; Schleicher; Sutton; Tom Green
